Introduction
page.enlisting:
➢ MODIS inter-comparison is focused on L1B products • current calibration version Collection 5 (C5) has produced L1B products • recently released Collection 6 (C6) contains a major adjustment in calibration coefficient estimate to handle known issues with the aging MODIS sensors ➢Terra/Aqua MODIS differences are estimated in brightness ➢ MODIS inter-comparison is focused on L1B products

page.title:
Results ---- Equator ocean
Results
---- Equator ocean

Summary
Summary
page.enlisting:
➢In comparison with MODIS C5, C6 significantly reduces the differences between MODIS and IASI measurements as well as differences between Terra/Aqua MODIS ➢Long-term MODIS/IASI comparison time series show a stable trend for key MODIS TEB ➢ No apparent Aqua CFPA temperature anomaly impact is observed on L1B ➢In comparison with MODIS C5, C6 significantly reduces the differences between MODIS and IASI measurements as well as differences between Terra/Aqua MODIS
